original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3571)@</color>武將身旁燃起烈火，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3571)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3571)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>傷害周圍的敵人。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3571)@</color> A fire ignited next to the military commander, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3571) @</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3571)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> to damage surrounding enemies.
